title: Son Kite - Colours - Remixed (2014) FLAC
description:
Psy-Trance / Progressive Trance / Downtempo / Psybient


Tracklist:
01. Let Us Be (LOUD Remix) (7:53)
02. Games And Watch (Liquid Soul Remix) (9:01)
03. Jukebox (Antix Remix) (10:22)
04. The Stars Within Us (Donato Dozzy Remix) (8:29)
05. On Air (Carbon Based Lifeforms Remix) (7:35)

About:
Son Kite 2014 revival!

We guess that you all remember the classic Son Kite album "Colours" from 2004. Widely regarded one of the trendsetting acts in the progressive scene, the Swedish duo's last album as Son Kite is a milestone and an inspiration to many.
Now - 10 years later - we have the privilege to present a new and exclusive remix-release with 5 brand new remixes by no other than Loud, Liquid Soul, Antix, Donato Dozzy, and Carbon Based Lifeforms.

The release is separated into a part 1 and a part 2, and will be released with a few weeks in between. Expect fresh new interpretations of the highest caliber.
The Israeli phenomenon Loud is behind a classy remix of "Let Us Be". With a 90's inspired gritty bassline they have made a heavy-hitter of a psychedelic remix for the festival dancefloors, while Liquid Soul's remix of "Game And Watch" is crisp, sharp and floating trance for the morning hours. Ultra smooth Liquid Soul signature sound.

The third remix is by the Antix-brothers. For almost 14 years the two from Down under have pushed the boundaries of deep and hypnotic music, and their tribal techy interpretation of "Jukebox" will be equally suitable in the peak-hours in a dark and sweaty club as well as at secret parties in the Australian outback.
On the last tracks there is less emphasis on the dance floor. Donato Dozzy has taken "The Stars Within Us" in an interesting direction with a mix of drony dub techno and electronica, and finally the Swedish ambient duo Carbon Based Lifeforms have made a stellar, cinematic and acidy downbeat remix for one of the biggest hits on "Colours"; "On Air".
A diverse and coulourful tribute to one of the best albums in the past 10 years.

released 20 March 2014

Genre: Psy-Trance, Progressive Trance, Downtempo, Psybient

Country: Israel
